name: Blox (itch) (Olaowo)
description:
You take the role of programmed threat to test a new Security Environment

Controls:

  • Movement: W/A/S/D/Arrow Keys
  • Shoot: 1st Mouse Button
  • Dash: 2nd Mouse Button/ Q 
  • ForceField: Middle Mousel button / E

Please report any Bugs Found.

PC Version is available for download , incase there is problem with Web Version
